amendment.description: To prohibit amounts appropriated under this Act to carry out parts A and B of subtitle V of title 49, United States Code, from being expended unless all the steel, iron, and manufactured products used in the project are produced in the United States.

action.text: Amendment SA 879 under the order of 10/19/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 44. Record Vote Number: 174.

Amendment SA 879 proposed by Senator Merkley to Amendment SA 738. (consideration: CR S6732-6734; text: CR S6733) To prohibit amounts appropriated under this Act to carry out parts A and B of subtitle V of title 49, United States Code, from being expended unless all the steel, iron, and manufactured products used in the project are produced in the United States.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 879 under the order of 10/19/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 44. Record Vote Number: 174.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 879 under the order of 10/19/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 44. Record Vote Number: 174.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 879 proposed by Senator Merkley to Amendment SA 738.
